audioText: Je commençais à comprendre l'impression de bonheur que ressentait ma lèvre.
question: Je ______ à comprendre l'impression de bonheur que ressentait ma lèvre.
explanation: The text states 'Je commençais à comprendre l'impression de bonheur que ressentait ma lèvre' - I was beginning to understand the feeling of happiness that my lip was experiencing. 'Commençais' is the first person singular imperfect form of 'commencer' (to begin), expressing a continuous action in the past.
source: Strategic targeting: commençais + impression + bonheur + lèvre
